description:
Hike+ is the only hiking app developed by World Champion Athletes!

Hike+ integrates seamlessly with the Hike + iOS App to display hike time, pace, distance, altitude, grade, total climbing , and more. Users can start and stop hike recordings, toggle segment timers, and view maps all from the convenience of your wrist.
